attributes.action: 150,000 dead because of social murder. We want the government to resign.
attributes.additional_details: European partys don't have the animosity Conservatives have towards every good thing the Labour party has created over the years. The NHS has been sold and new hospitals built by PFI companies charging millions in interest costing the tax payer 5 times as much for a fully equipped hospital. Those former Labour voters elected Conservatives simply because they promised us a descent Brexit deal.
attributes.background: The government do nothing until forced to, disabled people die of despair because benefits have been cut or cancelled to pay back banks whose collapse occurred because of the chancellors mistakes. The UN say it's wrong. This is social murder and should not be allowed in this country or any country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked or resign, or requests for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
